description: "A map of railway lines between Fort de Kock (Bukittinggi) and Pajakombo (Payakumbuh) in western Sumatra. The map includes existing line, planned line and rack railway line (a line with a rack and pinion system so it can operate on steep slopes)."
title: "Overzichtskaart van den ontworpen spoorweg Fort de Kock-Pajakombo"
